subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: John A. Nerud has overseen a stable full of great horses, and he bred and owned Fappiano, American Pharoah’s great-great-grandfather.
snippet: John A. Nerud has overseen a stable full of great horses, and he bred and owned Fappiano, American Pharoah’s great-great-grandfather.
